dcterms:description: A well-known indoor multi-view stereo dataset, consisting of 124 scenes captured under 7 distinct lighting conditions. It is used for training and testing in various multi-view stereo methods.
dcterms:title: DTU

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for generalized multi-view stereo networks, used to evaluate the generalization ability of surface reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: BlendedMVS
